Parameters.Name: pCompany
Parameters.Prompt: Company to Transfer. Blank for all

Parameters.Name: pPeriod
Parameters.Prompt: Blank is current period, "ALL PERIODS" is all periods,  "yyyymm" to specifiy a particular period, "yyyy" to specify a particular year

Parameters.Name: pFact
Parameters.Prompt: Select "Yes" to also transfer this data clear to MA_Fact

Parameters.Name: pConfirm
Parameters.Prompt: Select "Yes" to confirm WARNING: DATA DELETION. PLEASE ENSURE ALL ABOVE PARAMETERS ARE CORRECT BEFORE CONFIRMING,
